About.paragraph: Hi, my name is Rupendra Singh, I'm a full-stack web developer, during my college days, I was very attracted to web applications because I wanted to understand the functionalities of a website and was curious to learn how a website could appear so interactive and responsive and how the backend operations take place.This led me to choosing full stack web development as my path. So, I joined Masai School and became a competitive programmer and a full-stack web developer.Now, I have hands-on experience in building websites and web applications. I specialize in JavaScript. As a Full-Stack web developer, I want to meet the requirements of the mocks and fulfill the user stories and make CRED operations for building user-friendly and dynamic websites.
About.paragraphII: Well-organised person, problem solver, competitive programmer with high attention to detail. Fan of Cricket, outdoor activities, Web series and Bike riding. A friendly person, Interested in the entire frontend spectrum and working on ambitious projects with positive people.

Features.title: Html
Features.text: HTML is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

Features.title: Css
Features.text: CSS is designed to enable the separation of presentation and content, including layout, colors, and fonts.

Features.title: JavaScript
Features.text: JavaScript is used to enables interactive web pages and is an essential part of web applications.

Features.title: React
Features.text: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

Features.title: MongoDB
Features.text: MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database program.

Features.title: Express js
Features.text: Express.js,is a back end web application framework for Node.js, released as free and open-source software.

Features.title: Node.js
Features.text: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, back-end JavaScript runtime environment.

Features.title: Bootstrap
Features.text: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, front-end web development.
